pullRequest.title: Resolve correct service privileges for user
pullRequest.bodyText:
When a user SSOs to a service provider, the IdP will provide
attributes to indicate the user's access (roles) in that service.
This change connect the component that determines the user's access
(UserPrivilegeResolver) to the action that generates the SAML response
(TransportSamlInitiateSingleSignOnAction).

commit.message:
Resolve correct service privileges for user

When a user SSOs to a service provider, the IdP will provide
attributes to indicate the user's access (roles) in that service.

This change connect the component that determines the user's access
(UserPrivilegeResolver) to the action that generates the SAML response
(TransportSamlInitiateSingleSignOnAction).
